tool_description:
Store files in an immutable way to allow integrity verification with the help of Blockchain technology.
Simply use a POST or GET request to either store a file hash or to verify a file hash.
name: DecentProve
title: DecentProve

api_list.name: Proof
api_list.description:
API endpoint to verify hashes.

###Return values:
**Hash**: The hash of the file
**Timestamp**: ISO timestamp in ms
**identifier**: Optional metadata you have attached
**messageId**: The message id you can use for verifying the return data
